headline: LandBridge Invites Tech Investors To Unlock The Permian Basin
summary: The Permian Basin, the premier U.S. shale-oil production region, is rapidly developing into much more complex territory.  Already a stronghold for wind and solar power, it has recently become home to a rising number of high-tech "computer ranches" dedicated to bitcoin mining.  Companies like LandBridge, which owns and leases acreage in the Permian, aim to drive that trend even further.
